title: lch()
description: The `lch()` CSS function specifies a color using the LCH color space, which describes colors based on lightness, chroma and hue.
content: The color function that defines colors using the LCH (Lightness, Chroma, Hue) color space. It's a perceptually uniform color model, meaning that changes in the LCH values produce consistent changes in color perception, making it ideal for accessible and consistent color design.
